text: Ic Oswald bisceop þurh Godes giefe mid geþafunge & leafe Eadgares Angulcyningces & Ælfheres Mercna heretogan & þæs heorodes on Wiogornaceastre landes sumne dæl þæt syndIIIhida þe fram cuþum mannum Hindehlep is gehaten sumum wife þære is noma ælfild for Godes lufon & for uncre sibbe mid eallum þingum þe þærto belimpað freolice hiere dæg forgieaf.
& æfter hiere dæge twam yrfeweardum & æfter heora forðsiþe to þære halgan stowe into Wiogornaceastre þam biscope to bryce.
Si hit ælces þinges freoh butan ferdfare & walgeworc & brycgeworc & circanlade.
Þis wæs gedon ymbe nigon hund wintra & seox & seoxtig þæs þe Drihtnes gebyrdtide wæs on þy seofoþan geare þæs þe Oswald bisceop to folgaðe feng.
Sancta Maria & sanctus Michahel cum sancto Petro & eallum Godes halgum gemiltien þis haldendum.
Gif hwa buton gewrihtum hit abrecan wille God hine to rihtere bote gecerre.
Her is seo hondseten Oswaldes biscopes.
